name: Mystery Mansion – Match3 Mania
description:
Our new match 3 game is the spookiest matching puzzle yet! Go on a haunted adventure through the mystery mansion, explore unique worlds and solve fun, relaxing match 3 puzzles. With more content added each week and tons of extra features – from collecting HD artwork to crafting rare treasures, you’ll have hours of fun playing our new match 3 puzzle game.



-----------------------------------------------------------------
MATCH 3 MYSTERY MANSION – HIGHLIGHTS
-----------------------------------------------------------------
100+ match 3 puzzles and bonus levels to enjoy
More content added weekly
Collect, craft & sell amazing rare treasures
Unlock HD artwork – it’s yours to keep!
Use power ups & boosters to help win levels
Rescue and evolve your pet monster
Match special tiles for insane combos and scores
Free rewards and coins just for logging on!
Adventure through unique worlds & explore mystery mansion



SOLVE RELAXING MATCH 3 PUZZLES

Sit back, relax and enjoy the stunning artwork and relaxing music as you match tiles and solve the fun puzzles. The gameplay is simple – just match 3 or more tiles to clear them from the board and earn points. Earn enough points and complete the objectives before the move counter runs out to complete the level!

With no time limits, this is the ultimate casual match 3 experience, suitable for all ages and skill levels! Best of all, we release new content regularly, so keep checking back for new puzzles!



CRAZY COMBOS. HUGE SCORES!

Match more than 3 tiles to create a special tile. Use bombs to clear entire rows or rainbow tiles to clear a particular set of tiles from the board completely – discover even more as you play and match as many tiles as possible. Combine special tiles to get the highest scores possible!



TONS OF FREE REWARDS AND PRIZES

At match 3 mystery mansion we love giving out free coins and prizes! You’ll receive huge daily rewards just for logging in, so make sure to keep checking back for the freebies. After you solve a match 3 puzzle, you’ll be able to open a mystery chest containing collectibles, coins and more. There’s even a magic coin globe which fills up over time, all you need to do is empty it!


Match 3 Adventure – Mystery Mansion is a fun, casual match 3 game suitable for anybody! You can play with or without an internet connection and take the puzzles with you anywhere. With tons of content and more added regularly, the fun never stops!



READY A MATCH 3 ADVENTURE IN MYSTERY MANSION? DOWNLOAD FREE TODAY!
